title: ICE when not providing a type in a closure parameter
body:
### Code ```rust fn main() { let a = |_| 15; } ``` ### Meta - What version of Rust GCC were you using: [a4c851d](https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/commit/a4c851df0358389970ffe3ce1ad495954729fc5f). ### Error output ``` rust1: internal compiler error: in get_type, at rust/ast/rust-expr.h:2219 0x7a1adb Rust::AST::ClosureParam::get_type() ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast/rust-expr.h:2219 ```
Backtrace

``` 0x7a1adb Rust::AST::ClosureParam::get_type() ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast/rust-expr.h:2219 0x7a1adb Rust::AST::ClosureParam::get_type() ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast/rust-expr.h:2217 0x7a1adb Rust::Resolver::EarlyNameResolver::visit(Rust::AST::ClosureExprInner&) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.cc:329 0xb311b3 Rust::Resolver::EarlyNameResolver::visit(Rust::AST::LetStmt&) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.cc:1083 0xb30391 operator() ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.cc:337 0xb30391 __invoke_impl&> /usr/include/c++/11/bits/invoke.h:61 0xb30391 __invoke_r&> /usr/include/c++/11/bits/invoke.h:111 0xb30391 _M_invoke /usr/include/c++/11/bits/std_function.h:290 0xb321e0 std::function::operator()() const /usr/include/c++/11/bits/std_function.h:590 0xb321e0 Rust::Resolver::EarlyNameResolver::scoped(unsigned int, std::function) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.h:50 0xb321e0 Rust::Resolver::EarlyNameResolver::visit(Rust::AST::BlockExpr&) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.cc:335 0xb30351 operator() ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.cc:36 0xb30351 __invoke_impl&> /usr/include/c++/11/bits/invoke.h:61 0xb30351 __invoke_r&> /usr/include/c++/11/bits/invoke.h:111 0xb30351 _M_invoke /usr/include/c++/11/bits/std_function.h:290 0xb3324d std::function::operator()() const /usr/include/c++/11/bits/std_function.h:590 0xb3324d Rust::Resolver::EarlyNameResolver::scoped(unsigned int, std::function) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.h:50 0xb3324d Rust::Resolver::EarlyNameResolver::go(Rust::AST::Crate&) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-early-name-resolver.cc:34 0xa37729 Rust::Session::expansion(Rust::AST::Crate&) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:850 0xa442a0 Rust::Session::compile_crate(char const*) ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:557 ```
